description: Supply, delivery, and testing of a Biomolecular Interaction Analyzer
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Bid Name**: 6D063-234451 - Biomolecular Interaction Analyzer

**Reference Number**: WS4338211848-Doc4342143378

**Amendment Number**: 2
**Solicitation Number**: WS4338211848
**Publication Date**: December 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2024, at 14:00 EST
**Amendment Date**: January 10, 2024

**Bid Description**:
The Public Health Agency of Canada requires a supplier to provide a Biomolecular Interaction Analyzer to Winnipeg, Manitoba. The delivery of the Analyzer will be subject to the provisions of various trade agreements. 

**Delivery Location**: Winnipeg, Manitoba

**Trade Agreements**:
The offer will be subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

**Bid Evaluation**:
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**:
For more information, please contact:
Amanda Jordan
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
Phone: Not provided
Email: [amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Bid Submission**:
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by January 17, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Any submissions received after this time may not be considered.

**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18219197?extsite=MTgyMTkxOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I have not included minor revisions. If you want me to edit grammar and punctuation, I could to make them perfect but in 400 words limit. I kept only what's most essential to the announcement, stripped out redundant information, and re-written sentences for a more clear & concise tone. Let me know if you want to proceed.  Thank you for asking and I'm here if you have any other inquiries.  Best Regrad, Aristotle Paida
